params.sqlcmd: "select " +" A.\\"TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD\\" as \\"TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD\\", " +" A.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" A.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" B.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" A.\\"LOT_NO\\" as \\"LOT_NO\\", " +" B.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" B.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" A.\\"VEND_LOT_NO\\" as \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", " +" A.\\"ISSUE_PLANT_CD\\" as \\"ISSUE_PLANT_CD\\", " +" C.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\", " +" A.\\"ISSUE_WH_CD\\" as \\"ISSUE_WH_CD\\", " +" D.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(A.\\"ISSUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"ISSUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(A.\\"ISSUE_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"ISSUE_QTY\\", " +" A.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" E.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(A.\\"RCV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"RCV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(A.\\"RCV_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"RCV_QTY\\", " +" A.\\"TRANSPORT_CMPLT_TYP\\" as \\"TRANSPORT_CMPLT_TYP\\", " +" A.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" B.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" B.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" G.\\"RCV_ISSUE_COMMENT\\" as \\"RCV_ISSUE_COMMENT\\", " +" F.\\"RCV_ISSUE_COMMENT\\" as \\"ISSUE_COMMENT\\" " +"from " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK A, " +" M_ITEM B, " +" M_PLANT C, " +" M_WH D, " +" M_VEND_CTRL E, " +" T_RCV_ISSUE F, " +" T_RCV_ISSUE G " +"where " +" A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD " +" and A.ISSUE_PLANT_CD = C.PLANT_CD " +" and A.ISSUE_WH_CD = D.WH_CD " +" and A.VEND_CD = E.VEND_CD(+) " +" and A.\\"RCV_WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and A.\\"TRANSPORT_CMPLT_TYP\\" = ? " +" and A.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\" = F.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\"(+) " +" and A.\\"LAST_RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\" = G.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\"(+) " +"order by " +" A.\\"TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD\\""

"insert into " +" T_RCV_ISSUE(\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_TYP\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_QTY\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_DATE\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", \\"COMPANY_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"CONS_TYP\\", \\"LOT_NO\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\", \\"RCV_ISSUE_COMMENT\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)"

"update " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK " +"set " +" \\"RCV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?), " +" \\"RCV_QTY\\" = \\"RCV_QTY\\" + TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"TRANSPORT_CMPLT_TYP\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"LAST_RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.\\"TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') as \\"sum_STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(SUM(T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') as \\"sum_STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +"from " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM'"
"select " +" TO_CHAR(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"RCV_PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"RCV_PLANT_NAME\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"RCV_WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" as \\"RCV_WH_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT, " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.PLANT_CD = M_PLANT.PLANT_CD " +" and M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"TO_CHAR_MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK " +"where " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.\\"TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +"FOR UPDATE nowait"

"SELECT " +" TBLA.JOB_ODR_CD AS JOB_ODR_CD, " +" NVL(MAX(TBLA.JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO), 0) AS JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK TBLA " +"WHERE " +" TBLA.JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND TBLA.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND TBLA.WH_CD = ? " +" AND TBLA.PLANT_CD = ? " +"GROUP BY " +" JOB_ODR_CD"

"SELECT " +" TBLA.JOB_ODR_CD AS JOB_ODR_CD, " +" NVL(MAX(TBLA.JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO), 0) AS JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO " +"FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_CD_STOCK TBLA " +"WHERE " +" TBLA.JOB_ODR_CD = ? " +" AND TBLA.ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND TBLA.WH_CD = ? " +" AND TBLA.PLANT_CD = ? " +"GROUP BY " +" JOB_ODR_CD"

"SELECT " +" TBLA.RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD AS RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD, " +" TBLA.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD, " +" TBLA.ISSUE_PLANT_CD AS ISSUE_PLANT_CD, " +" TBLA.ISSUE_WH_CD AS ISSUE_WH_CD, " +" TBLA.JOB_ODR_CD AS JOB_ODR_CD, " +" TO_CHAR(TBLA.ISSUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS ISSUE_DATE, " +" TBLA.RCV_PLANT_CD AS RCV_PLANT_CD, " +" TBLA.RCV_WH_CD AS RCV_WH_CD " +"FROM " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK TBLA " +"WHERE " +" TBLA.TRANSPORT_SLIP_CD = ?"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_PLANTMOVE(ISSUE_CTRL_CD, ISSUE_ITEM_CD, ISSUE_PLANT_CD, ISSUE_WH_CD, ISSUE_JOB_ODR_CD, ISSUE_JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO, ISSUE_DATE, RCV_CTRL_CD, RCV_ITEM_CD, RCV_PLANT_CD, RCV_WH_CD, RCV_JOB_ODR_CD, RCV_JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO, RCV_DATE, LOT_NO) " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_DATE(?), ?)"

"select " +" to_char(T_LOT_STOCK.STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY, 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY, " +" to_char(T_LOT_STOCK.DEFECT_QTY, 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as DEFECT_QTY, " +" to_char((T_LOT_STOCK.STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY - T_LOT_STOCK.ALCD_QTY), 'FM999999999999999990.0999') as ALLOCABLE_QTY " +"from " +" T_LOT_STOCK " +"where " +" T_LOT_STOCK.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_STOCK.WH_CD = ? " +" and T_LOT_STOCK.LOT_NO = ?"
"select " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\") as \\"LOT_CTRL_FLG\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" VEND_CD " +"FROM " +" M_WH " +"WHERE " +" M_WH.WH_CD = ?"

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_PLANT, " +" M_WH, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" T_RCV_ISSUE " +"where " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.ISSUE_PLANT_CD = M_PLANT.PLANT_CD " +" and T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.ISSUE_WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.VEND_CD = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.\\"RCV_WH_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.\\"TRANSPORT_CMPLT_TYP\\" = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= NVL(TO_NUMBER(?), ROWNUM) + 1 " +" and T_TRANSPORT_STOCK.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\" = T_RCV_ISSUE.\\"RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD\\"(+)"
"SELECT " +" PROC_EXEC_DATE " +"FROM " +" SYS_ACTUAL_COST_CTRL_AC " +"WHERE " +" PLANT_CD = ?"
"UPDATE " +" T_TRANSPORT_STOCK t " +"SET " +" t.TRANSPORT_CMPLT_TYP = 0 " +"WHERE " +" t.transport_slip_cd = ?"

cell.name: TRANSPORT_CMPLT_TYP_name
cell.description: コンボボックス 表示名

cell.name: TRANSPORT_CMPLT_TYP_val
cell.description: コンボボックス 値

cell.name: w_RCV_ISSUE_CTRL_CD
cell.description: DB更新用 入出庫管理番号

cell.name: w_RCV_ISSUE_TYP
cell.description: DB更新用 入出庫区分

cell.name: w_RCV_ISSUE_GNR_TYP
cell.description: DB更新用 入出庫発生区分

cell.name: w_PLANT_CD
cell.description: DB更新用 工場コード

cell.name: w_COMPANY_CD
cell.description: DB更新用 会社コード
